page.title: 06THINGS I LIKE DOING
page.content: These are some of the things I like doing. In winter I like sliding down the slippery slope throwing snowballs and skidding on the smooth ice. I like sitting beside the warm fire eating buttered crumpets. In the spring I like skipping and playing football. I like playing games from other countries at Brownies. In summer I like making daisy chains and daisy caterpillars. I like climbing trees best in summer because all the trees have got their leaves and nobody can see you. In autumn I like to shuffle through the leaves and throw them high in the air. At home on a rainy day I like playing board games like draughts, chess, Cluedo, Monopoly and Donkey Kong. Also I like playing with the computer. We have got a ZX Spectrum.
